info.title: Book Catalogue API
info.description: This API handles operations related to books in the catalog.

tags.name: Books
tags.description: Endpoints for managing books in the library

get.description: Endpoint to search for a book by its ISBN.

parameters.name: isbn
parameters.description: ISBN of the book to search for. Must be in ISBN-10 or ISBN-13 format.

400.description: Invalid ISBN format. Must be ISBN-10 or ISBN-13.

example.example: Invalid ISBN format. Must be ISBN-10 or ISBN-13.

get.description: Endpoint to search for books with optional filters. You can filter by title, author, publication year, category, language, and featured type.

parameters.name: title
parameters.example: El día que se perdió la cordura

parameters.name: publicationYear
parameters.description: Search for books by publication year.

parameters.name: featuredType
parameters.description: Filter books by featured type (e.g., bestSeller).

404.description: No books found for the given search criteria.

example.example: No results found for the given search criteria.

post.description: Endpoint to create a new book in the catalog.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Book details to create a new book.

example.example: Validation failed. Check the provided data.
Duplicate ISBN: a book with this ISBN already exists.

get.description: Endpoint to fetch all featured books, where the featured type is not "none".

500.description: Unexpected error while fetching featured books.

example.example: Unexpected error while fetching featured books.

get.description: Endpoint to fetch the 10 latest books, ordered by publication year in descending order.

500.description: Internal server error. Please try again later.

example.example: Internal server error. Please try again later.

get.description: Endpoint to fetch statistics about the books collection, including total books, number of authors, most popular genre, and most prolific author.

patch.description: Endpoint to update the download count for a specific book identified by its ISBN.

parameters.name: isbn
parameters.description: ISBN of the book to update the download count.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Download count to update for the book.

400.description: Validation failed. Check the provided data.

example.example: Validation failed. Check the provided data.

500.description: Unexpected error while updating download count.

example.example: Unexpected error while updating download count.

patch.description: Endpoint to update the total reading lists count for a specific book identified by its ISBN.

parameters.name: isbn
parameters.description: ISBN of the book to update the reading lists count.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Reading lists count to update for the book.

example.example: Book total reading lists updated successfully.

400.description: Validation failed. Check the provided data.

example.example: Validation failed. Check the provided data.

500.description: Unexpected error while updating total reading lists.

example.example: Unexpected error while updating total reading lists.

delete.description: Endpoint to delete a book from the catalog by ISBN.

parameters.name: isbn
parameters.description: ISBN of the book to be deleted.

example.example: Invalid ISBN format. Must be ISBN-10 or ISBN-13.

put.description: Endpoint to update the details of a book by ISBN.

parameters.name: isbn
parameters.description: ISBN of the book to be updated.

400.description: Invalid ISBN format or validation error.

example.example: Invalid ISBN format or validation error.
El día que se perdió la cordura
Centro de Boston, 24 de diciembre, un hombre camina desnudo con la cabeza decapitada de una joven...
